bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: ① Pathological Mechanism of a loss of qi in the course of profuse sweating, massive diarrhea and excessive bleeding. Su wen 素問 39: 炅則腠理開，榮衛通，汗大泄，故氣泄 , “When one is hot, the interstitial structures open. The camp [qi] and guard [qi] pass through. Sweat flows out profusely. Hence, there is qi outflow ”.

② Pathological Condition identical with pi xie 脾泄 , spleen outflow. Pu ji fang 普濟方 21: 治久患脾胃氣泄不 止。用蕪荑五兩搗末，以飯丸如梧桐子大，每日空心午飯前，各用陳米 飲下三十丸 , “To cure [patients] suffering from unending spleen and stomach qi outflow use wu yi , 5 liang , and pound to a powder. Take rice to prepare pills the size of wu tong seeds. Take 30 pills daily with the liquid obtained by boiling rice on an empty stomach prior to lunch”.
